The Great Gatsby: This 1925 novel follows a cast of characters living in the fictional town of West Egg on prosperous Long Island in the summer of 1922.
The Bell Jar: This 1963 novel tells the story of 19-year-old Esther Greenwood, a brilliant college student works as guest editor with eleven other girls at a New York magazine.
I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings: This autobiography describes the coming of age story of a black girl in the American South during the 1930s and subsequently in California during the 1940s.
